title: Borthwick: Shrinking Global Influence Powers GBP Plunge (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Doug Borthwick, Managing Director/Head:FX at Chapdelaine & Co, with a look at currencies and the sinking pound.
